name: Peeb Adventures
storyline: Peeb is a small video game protagonist in the fictionally famous game "Peeb Quest: Kingdom Come." While exploring the game normally, Peeb begins to learn that things aren't as they seem. After encountering the Royal Usurper (his original game's final boss) early in the game, Peeb learns that the usurper has been corrupted by a mysterious lost AI named "ENT_01," who sends Peeb into the backcode to keep him from restarting the game by collecting the monkey king's crown. It's then up to Peeb to escape the backcode by traversing several game genres in order to come back and defeat ENT_01 once and for all...
summary:
Peeb goes on a comedic adventure to escape the back-code of his game after being banished by a mysterious entity... Will he succeed?

Swing around in this retro-styled third-person platformer as the titular Peeb, solving puzzles and navigating obstacles with your trusty grappling hook...
